What happens if the trace on Ash 2X3ZB9CY is successful during a Khusyuk run?
answer:
Khushyuk replaces the Runnerâ€™s access step with its own ability, but Ash still prohibits the Runner from accessing any card other than itself. The Runner reveals cards from the top of R&D, but does not access any of them, nor do they access Ash.
